name: 乌鸦 - Crows
description:
The Crows is the first person horror experience. In the skin of a suicidal youth,
You set foot on the darkness between life and death. Your main goal is to survive your own fears.

Introduction:

In the remote forest of Aokihara. The place where the soul seeks liberation.
Curious and terrible place. A young man is doing his camp and waiting for the right moment for his redemption.
But there is something hidden in the darkness. Natural entity: death.
Once you get there, your only hope is to escape.
Your fear defines your destiny, and your agility defines your success.
What is the darkness of the forest reverberating to the destination?

Features:

  • Horror experience: You are not a warrior - If you want to survive the horror of Aokihara, your only chance is to run... or hide
  • Immersive graphics: High-quality graphics give players a detailed, terrible world to explore.
  • The immersive sound effect: the ambient sound provides the feeling of the forest.
